segments.text: As an existing banker , that will speed up the process . You said you had the documents with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Before I verify those , I need you to fill in some forms . Then , as I said , I need to see valid credentials , your occupation and income details ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , as I expected . How much will you allow me to borrow ? I mean , I don't need a massive sum of money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are authorized to borrow up to 20,000 RIB , with a repayment period of up to 1 year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That'll be enough , and the repayment period sounds good to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can also look at your current credit status and adjust the interest accordingly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How soon before this goes through ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you sort out all of the paperwork today , you could have your loan by the end of the week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perfect . So , I guess my next job is to go to the newsagent and buy some car magazines . Thanks for everything .
segments.speaker: S2
